QuestData.Title: Feeding An Army
QuestData.Description: We've had a chance to work with these beasts for a while now, and that's allowed us to develop a brand-new trap for you to try out. It should be much sturdier than the last one.$B$BThe Improved Iron Trap will let you capture some of the meatiest beasts on Draenor. You will find that a single riverbeast or boar from Gorgrond can feed many warriors.$B$BTrap one and bring it back, and we will cook you a savage meal.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Improved Iron Trap to capture a Boar or Riverbeast in Gorgrond and then place a Work Order at your Barn.
